item.title: Installing Dependencies
item.description: This guide serves as an introduction to several key entities that can be managed with Apache Polaris (Incubating), describes how to build and deploy Polaris locally, and finally includes examples of how to use Polaris with Apache Sparkâ„¢. Prerequisites This guide covers building Polaris, deploying it locally or via Docker, and interacting with it using the command-line interface and Apache Spark. Before proceeding with Polaris, be sure to satisfy the relevant prerequisites listed here.
